mapper.select: select seq , writer , title , content , substring(create_date,1,10) as date from notice where del_yn != 'Y' order by create_date desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
mapper.update: update notice set del_yn = 'Y' where seq = #{seq}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) as noticeTotal FROM notice where 1 = 1 and del_yn = 'N'
